class.desc: An enum, and return code, for the result of a module's move function.

constant.name: SUCCESS
constant.desc: Means that the move was successful.

constant.name: AT_END
constant.desc: Means that the module could not do the move, because it is at the end, in the given direction.

constant.name: STUCK
constant.desc: Means that the module is stuck now.

constant.name: INVALID
constant.desc: Means that the move direction was invalid for this module or node.
